title: Novaria Group Acquires Plasma Ruggedized Solutions
summary: FORT WORTH, Texas--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Novaria Group (Novaria), a portfolio company of Arcline Investment Management, today announced its acquisition of Plasma Ruggedized Solutions (PRS), a leading provider of high-reliability conformal coatings for sensitive electronics serving defense, medical, and advanced industrial applications.
